== K. Deniz Ogut ==
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="float:right;"style="border:.5"><nowiki>[[File:deniz_ubuwiki.png]]</nowiki>
|}
I have been using Ubuntu for about 4 years.

I come from Turkey and reside in Istanbul.

I am a member of <nowiki>[[http://www.lkd.org.tr/ | Linux Users' Association of Turkey]]</nowiki> and one of the admins of <nowiki>[[http://tuxweet.linux.org.tr/ | Tuxweet]]</nowiki> -a social network for Free Software & GNU/Linux supporters in Turkish - run by the Association.

I'm not a hacker; I don't know how to code. As a non-technical computer user, I just try to be a loyal supporter of Free Software Movement, GNU/Linux OS, namely Ubuntu.
